name: Mutilate-a-Doll 2
description: A highly customizable virtual stressball and physics sandbox about mutilating ragdolls in various ways using an overwhelming amount of weapons and tools.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 30 MB available space Additional Notes: MaD2 is a software accelerated Flash game. Hardware will help, but only up until a point.
